<xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Content-type" value="text/plain"/> <con:entry key="fiware-service" value="parking"/> <con:entry key="fiware-servicepath" value="/carTracking"/> </xml-fragment>

<xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Content-type" value="text/plain"/> <con:entry key="fiware-service" value="parking"/> <con:entry key="fiware-servicepath" value="/carTracking"/> </xml-fragment>

con:testStep.name: Create user Profile Administrator
con:testStep.con:description: Create user having the profile Administrator.

con:config.con:expectedResult: To verify the has been successfully created and activated, login into Account Portal, then success.

con:testStep.name: Create user Profile Operator
con:testStep.con:description: Create user having the profile Operator

con:config.con:expectedResult: To verify the has been successfully created and activated, login into Account Portal, then success.

con:testStep.name: Create user Profile Guest
con:testStep.con:description: Create user having the profile Guest

con:config.con:expectedResult: To verify the has been successfully created and activated, login into Account Portal, then success.

con:config.name: Account Portal Login
con:config.con:description: Login into Account Portal as Administrator

con:testStep.name: Register Application
con:testStep.con:description: The Administrator User registers the Parking Web Application on his account.

con:testStep.name: Authorize Role Permissions
con:testStep.con:description: The Administrator User, after registering the Parking Web Application on his account, authorizes Guest and Operator users to access to it.

con:testStep.name: Create user Administrator
con:testStep.con:description: Create user Administrator using the following test case: Run TS01_TC01 Step Create user Administrator

con:config.name: Account Portal Login
con:config.con:description: The Administrator User performs the following actions: 1. Login as Administrator.

con:testStep.name: Register Application
con:testStep.con:description: The Administrator User performs the following action: Register the Parking Web Application on his account.

con:testStep.name: Authorize Role Permissions
con:testStep.con:description: The Administrator User performs the following action: Authorizes Guest and Operator users to access to it.

con:testStep.name: Register a new PEP Proxy
con:testStep.con:description: The Administrator User performs the following action: Register a new PEP Proxy

con:config.con:expectedResult: Receives the PEP Proxy credentials on the Access Portal

con:testStep.name: TS02_TC01_LoginGuest
con:testStep.con:description: The Guest user can runs only the Data Visualization requests.

con:testStep.name: TS02_TC02_LoginOperator
con:testStep.con:description: The Operator user can runs only the Data Visualization requests and Update requests.

con:testStep.name: TS02_TC03_LoginAdministrator
con:testStep.con:description: The Administrator user can runs all kinds of requests.

con:testSuite.name: TS03_ParkingManagement
con:testSuite.con:description: The Test Suite manages the entity on Orion Context Broker.

con:testStep.name: Access permit
con:testStep.con:description: The function ModifyEntityParking is permitted to OPERATOR user. This configuration has been verified in the test case: ‎TS01_TC02 Register Application

con:config.con:expectedResult: The user has permission to modify the entity.

con:testStep.name: Access denied
con:testStep.con:description: The function ModifyEntityParking is NOT permitted to OPERATOR user. This configuration has been verified in the test case: ‎TS01_TC02 Register Application

con:config.con:expectedResult: The user has no one permission to modify the entity.

con:testSuite.name: TS04_ServiceRegistration
con:testSuite.con:description: The Test Suite verifies the communication between IDAS IoTAgent UL2.0 and Orion Context Broker. The scope is registering the service.

con:testSuite.name: TS05_DeviceRegistration
con:testSuite.con:description: The Test Suite verifies the communication between IDAS IoTAgent UL2.0 - Orion Context Broker The scope is registering the sensors.

con:testSuite.name: TS06_ObservationMeasurement
con:testSuite.con:description: The Test Suite verifies the communication between IDAS IoTAgent UL2.0 - Orion Context Broker. The scope is sending measures detected by the IoT sensors towards the Context Broker.

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Content-type" value="text/plain"/> <con:entry key="fiware-service" value="parking"/> <con:entry key="fiware-servicepath" value="/carTracking"/> </xml-fragment>

<xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Content-type" value="text/plain"/> <con:entry key="fiware-service" value="parking"/> <con:entry key="fiware-servicepath" value="/carTracking"/> </xml-fragment>

<xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Content-type" value="text/plain"/> <con:entry key="fiware-service" value="parking"/> <con:entry key="fiware-servicepath" value="/carTracking"/> </xml-fragment>

<xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Content-type" value="text/plain"/> <con:entry key="fiware-service" value="parking"/> <con:entry key="fiware-servicepath" value="/carTracking"/> </xml-fragment>

con:testSuite.name: TS07_DataVisualization
con:testSuite.con:description: The Test Suite verifies the communication between SpagoBI and Orion Context Broker. Spago produces reports retrieving data from Orion Context Broker.

con:testStep.name: _DynamicRepParkingData
con:testStep.con:description: Run the SpagoBI console and run the dynamic report. The dynamic report visualizes the Parking data in real-time mode. If a sensor sends a new measure, the dynamic report updates the reported value. When a sensor sends a new measure, Orion Data Context Broker notifies the update to SpagoBI. The console (dynamic report) data will be automatically updated.

con:testStep.name: _StaticRepParkingData
con:testStep.con:description: The static report visualizes all the Parking data. If a sensor sends a new measure, the static report doesn’t report the changed value. When the report is required, the client application sends an HTTP POST request towards SpagoBI component in order to view the entity data present on Orion Data Context Broker. The format to visualize data file is PDF or HTML.
